I really don't care about folks opinions of the movie...I want a quality download and comments on the quality of the upload.  The rest is just backround "static & chatter" that I have to put up with from mostly juvenille, racist, bombastic, and pontificating ass clowns.  I will use movie review sites and close friends to make determination of whether I want to see a movie.  And now I just added to the "static and chatter".  Sorry to the 90% of folks that use the service quietly and politely for adding to the noise.  Feel free to go ape-shite on this post...I couldn't care less...I won't waste my time checking back to see if my statement is popular or unpopular.  Oh cudos to the uploader...thanx man.

Was not expecting much because of bad reviews here, but found it fun to watch with OK action effects; quality good too. Not too much drawn out 'human drama' scenes either; though it does have the manditory hostage situation required by federal decree.

Guys - wizard4all has a point.  That point is that people come here looking for visual / audio data of how this copy/rip turned out.  Nobody is coming here to read movie reviews - and if they were they certainly wouldn't listen to a few lines of swears and some drunk mumbling about how some random pirate hated it because - in his own "professional" opinion, it was "gay".

People come here knowing exactly what the movie is and just want to hear comments on quality, not what you personally think about the movie itself.  So no, this absolutely is not the place to come and bash the movie.

Please keep your movie reviews to IMDB or some other site made to discuss the movie itself, here we just want to hear the quality of the rip.  This is common sense.  People come here looking for something that they know the details about already, they don't come here to decide if they want to see the movie or not they just need the specifics of the quality of this copy.

I love all the people bitching about how no one is interested in someone's opinion of the shit they torrent when it's no different than if someone gave their opinion on a product they got on Amazon, or an opinion on the seller whom they bought the product from.

Just shut the hell up and stop crying. I know I personally want to know if the content of the movie sucked because depending how many people say it does, I won't be pissed off if it does truly suck if I decide to download it anyway.

No one wants to realize that when people give A/V, they're opinions as well.

So stop crying, you fucking losers.

Great, high quality rip. Thanks SaM. 

For those interested, it is Cinavia protected so you have to keep changing the time every 20 minutes so you can watch it.

As for the film itself, I'll add my two cents. I believe they've done Ghost Rider very poorly considering other great movies out of this genre. I liked the first one though friends didn't and I thought I would enjoy this one but I was a bit disappointed. It wasn't as bad as some are saying but it was far from the level it should have been. I mainly attribute this to the story being poorly written.
